titles.title: Providing for the appointment of the Reverend James Ford as Chaplain emeritus of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Mr. Petri asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/10/1999--Introduced. Provides for the appointment of the Reverend James Ford as Chaplain emeritus of the House of Representative following his resignation as Chaplain.
